action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Baba Lysaga és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 16. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Baba Lysaga has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: Baba Lysaga can use an action to polymorph into a {@creature swarm of insects} (flies), or back into her true form. While in swarm form, she has a walking speed of 5 feet and a flying speed of 30 feet. Anything she is wearing transforms with her, but nothing she is carrying does.

trait.name: Blessing of Mother Night
entries: Baba Lysaga is shielded against divination magic, as though protected by a {@spell nondetection} spell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Baba Lysaga fa tres atacs with her quarterstaff.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Summon Swarms of Insects (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Baba Lysaga summons {@dice 1d4} swarms of insects. A summoned swarm appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Baba Lysaga and acts as her ally. It remains until it dies or until Baba Lysaga dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Baba Lysaga's Creeping Hut
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Constructed Nature
entries: An objecte animat doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An objecte animat reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The hut is {@condition incapacitated} while the magic gem that animates it is in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the hut must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The hut fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hut fa tres atacs with its roots. It can replace one of these attacks with a rock attack.

action.name: Root
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Pitchfork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Light Crossbows
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, ranged 80/320 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The witch és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The witch has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant. This attack is magical.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Broom of Animated Attack
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Constructed Nature
entries: An objecte animat doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An objecte animat reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The broom is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the broom must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the broom remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal broom.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The broom fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Broomstick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Animated Attack
entries: If the broom is motionless and a creature grabs hold of it, the broom makes a Destresa check contested by the creature's Força check. If the broom wins the contest, it flies out of the creature's grasp and makes a melee attack against it with advantage on the attack roll.

items.name: Two-Headed
entries: The mongrelfolk has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

items.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The mongrelfolk has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

trait.name: Snake-Swollen
entries: When a corpse is reduced to 0 hit points, it splits open, disgorging a {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes}. The snakes are hungry and fight until slain.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ezmerelda és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: In addition to her magic armor and weapons, Ezmerelda has two {@item potion of greater healing||potions of greater healing}, six {@item holy water (flask)|phb|vials of holy water}, and three wooden stakes.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ezmerelda fa tres atacs: two with her +1 rapier and one with her +1 handaxe or her silvered shortsword.

action.name: Rapier +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Handaxe +1
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Silvered Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Curse (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be cursed. While cursed, the target has vulnerability to one type of damage of Ezmerelda's choice. The curse lasts until ended with a {@spell greater restoration} spell, a {@spell remove curse} spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Ezmerelda takes {@dice 3d6} de dany psíquic.

action.name: Evil Eye (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save {@dc 14}), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Ezmerelda is {@condition blinded} until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

monster.name: Guardian Portrait
languages: plus up to two other languages

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The portrait és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). The portrapot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Constructed Nature
entries: An objecte animat doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An objecte animat reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The portrait is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the portrait must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the figure in the portrait remains motionless, the portrait is indistinguishable from a normal painting.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Izek fa dos atacs with his battleaxe.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 15 ({@dice 2d10 + 4}) si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Kasimir has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the him to sleep.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Kasimir wears a {@item ring of warmth} and carries a spellbook containing all the spells he has prepared plus the following spells: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell comprehend languages}, {@spell hold person}, {@spell identify}, {@spell locate object}, {@spell nondetection}, {@spell polymorph}, {@spell protection from evil and good}, {@spell ray of frost}, and {@spell wall of stone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Kasimir és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight makes two longsword attacks or two fist attacks.

items.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature against which the knight has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Fiona és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Madam Eva és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 16. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Madam Eva has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Curse (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or be cursed. While cursed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened}. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a {@spell remove curse} spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Madam Eva takes {@dice 5d6} de dany psíquic.

action.name: Evil Eye (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save {@dc 17}), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: {@spell animal friendship}, {@spell charm person}, or {@spell hold person}. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Madam Eva is {@condition blinded} until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

items.name: Flight
entries: The mongrelfolk has leathery wings and a flying speed of 40 feet.

action.name: Shovel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The mongrelfolk pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Extraordinary Feature
entries: The mongrelfolk has one of the following extraordinary features, determined randomly by rolling a {@dice d20} or chosen by the DM:
1–3: Amfibi. The mongrelfolk pot respirar aire i a l'aigua
4–9: Darkvision. The mongrelfolk has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
10: Flight. The mongrelfolk has leathery wings and a flying speed of 40 feet.
11–15: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts. The mongrelfolk has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.
16–17: Spider Climb. The mongrelfolk pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.
18–19: Standing Leap. The mongrelfolk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

20: Two-Headed. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The mongrelfolk can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mongrelfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claw or dagger.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Standing Leap
entries: The mongrelfolk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

monster.name: Phantom Warrior
languages: tot idioma que comprenia en vida

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The phantom warrior pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 60 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The phantom warrior pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Spectral Armor and Shield
entries: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The phantom warrior fa dos atacs with its spectral longsword.

action.name: Spectral Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany de força.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The phantom warrior entra el Pla Etèri des del Pla Material (i viceversa). És visible des del Pla Material quan està al Llindar Eteri (i viceversa). Tanmateix no pot afectar ni ésser afectat per res de l'altre pla.

monster.name: Pidlwick II
languages: understands Common but doesn't speak and can't read or write

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: During the first round of combat, Pidlwick II has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn yet.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Rahadin és Intel·ligència. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Deathly Choir
entries: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a {@spell mind blank} spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a {@dc 16} Saviesa saving throw. Each creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Rahadin té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his {@condition poisoned} darts.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Rictavio és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: In addition to his sword cane, Rictavio wears a {@item hat of disguise} and a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and he carries a {@item spell scroll (5th level)||spell scroll} of {@spell raise dead}.

trait.name: Undead Slayer
entries: When Rictavio hits an undead with a weapon attack, the undead takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage of the weapon's type.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Rictavio fa dos atacs with his sword cane.

action.name: Sword Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent (wooden cane) or piercing damage (silvered sword).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Sir Godfrey és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 16. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

items.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitució saving throw or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mage és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Strahd és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: If Strahd isn't in running water or sunlight, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat, a Medium wolf, or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

While in bat or wolf form, Strahd can't speak. In bat form, his walking speed is 5 feet, and he has a flying speed of 30 feet. In wolf form, his walking speed is 40 feet. His statistics, other than his size and speed, are unchanged. Anything he is wearing transforms with him, but nothing he is carrying does. He reverts to his true form if he dies.

While in mist form, Strahd can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. He is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and he can't pass through water. He has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and he is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage he takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Strahd falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When Strahd drops to 0 hit points outside his coffin, he transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that he isn't in running water or sunlight. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

While he has 0 hit points in mist form, he can't revert to his vampire form, and he must abast his coffin within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in his coffin, he reverts to his vampire form. He is then {@condition paralyzed} until he regains at least 1 hit point. After 1 hour in his coffin with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Strahd recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in running water or sunlight. If he rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: Strahd can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without having to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Strahd has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} He can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} He takes 20 acid damage if he ends his turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into his heart while he is {@condition incapacitated} in his coffin, he is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} While in sunlight, Strahd takes 20 radiant damage at the start of his turn, and he has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
entries: Strahd fa dos atacs, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire or Wolf Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, Strahd can grapple it (escape {@dc 18}) instead of dealing the slashing damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura voluntària o una criatura que estigui {@condition grappled} by Strahd, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Strahd regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under Strahd's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: Strahd targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see Strahd, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic or be {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target regards Strahd as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. The target isn't under Strahd's control, but it takes Strahd's requests and actions in the most favorable way and lets Strahd bite it.

Each time Strahd or his companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Strahd is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Dia)
entries: Strahd magically calls {@dice 2d4} {@creature swarm of bats||swarms of bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||swarms of rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Strahd can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of Strahd and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Strahd dies, or until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: Strahd moves up to his speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Strahd makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Bite (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Strahd makes one bite attack.

monster.name: Strahd Zombie
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a {@dice d20} to determine what else happens to it:
1–8: One leg is severed from the zombie if it has any legs left.
9–16: One arm is severed from the zombie if it has any arms left.
17–20: The zombie is decapitated.

If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points, all parts of it die. Until then, a severed part acts on the zombie's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 8. Any damage it takes is subtracted from the zombie's hit points.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.
A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll. Each time the zombie loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the zombie loses its bite attack and its body is {@condition blinded} unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet. It can make a bite attack, but only against a target in its space.

The zombie's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls {@condition prone}. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0 feet, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Strahd's Animated Armor
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Constructed Nature
entries: An objecte animat doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An objecte animat reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The armor is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si armor es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal suit of armor.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The armor makes two melee attacks or uses Shocking Bolt twice.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Shocking Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany elèctric.

monster.name: The Mad Mage of Mount Baratok

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mad mage is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). He can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Tree Blight
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands Common and Druidic but doesn't speak

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si blight es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un dead tree.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The blight fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The blight fa quatre atacs: two with its branches and two with its grasping roots. If it has a target {@condition grappled}, the blight can also make a bite attack against that target as a bonus action.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Branch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Grasping Root
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one creature not {@condition grappled} by the blight. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany contundent at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 15 and can be severed by dealing 6 slashing damage or more to it at once. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the blight, but ends the grapple.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Vladimir recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Vladimir's body is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When Vladimir's body is destroyed, his soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a {@spell wish} spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Vladimir wields a +2 greatsword with a hilt sculpted to resemble silver dragon wings and a pommel shaped like a silver dragon's head clutching a black opal between its teeth.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: Vladimir is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: Vladimir knows the distance to and direction of Strahd, even if Strahd and Vladimir are on different planes of existence. If Strahd is destroyed, Vladimir knows.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Vladimir makes two fist attacks or two attacks with his +2 Greatsword.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. Strahd, the target of Vladimir's sworn vengeance, takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, Vladimir can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}) provided the target is Large or smaller.

action.name: Greatsword +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) de dany tallant. Against Strahd, Vladimir deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany tallant with this weapon.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: Vladimir can target Strahd within 30 feet provided he can see Strahd. Strahd ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. One a failure, Strahd is {@condition paralyzed} until Vladimir deals damage to him, or until the end of Vladimir's next turn. When the paralysis ends, Strahd is {@condition frightened} of Vladimir for 1 minute. Strahd can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if he can see Vladimir, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

items.name: Violent Death
entries: When a corpse is reduced to 0 hit points, it splits open, disgorging a {@creature swarm of poisonous snakes}. The snakes are hungry and fight until slain.

monster.name: Home-corb

walk.condition: (fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms)

languages: Common (can't speak en forma de corb)

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Saviesa (Insight) check.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The wereraven recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the wereraven takes damage from a silvered weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wereraven's next turn. The wereraven dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

action.name: Bec (Només en forma Híbrida o de Corb)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage en forma de corb, o 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant en forma híbrida. If the target is humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

action.name: Shortsword (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The mongrelfolk has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
